articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Korean April 26 Cartoon Film Studio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Korean April 26 Cartoon Film Studio
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent gifts to the Korean April 26 Cartoon Film Studio.
					 He visited the studio in November last year and clearly indicated the orientation and ways of creating famous works favored by the Korean people and school youth and children.
					
					 He sent as gifts modern equipment need for putting the studio on a higher modern, scientific, computerized and digital basis.
					
					 A ceremony of conveying the gifts took place at the studio on Saturday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and officials, creators, artistes and employees of the studio.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Friday sent a birthday spread to centenarian Jang Yong Suk residing in neighborhood unit 36 of Jonjin-dong, Raknang District, Pyongyang.
					 She was born as the fourth daughter of a tenant in Kowon County, South Hamgyong Province on Feb. 13, Juche 4 (1915). She experienced bitter sorrow as a member of the stateless nation, barely eking out living by doing needlework and laundry for others, subject to oppression and maltreatment by the Japanese imperialists and the exploiting class.
					
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthwhile life. She brought up her sons and daughters well so that they stood guard over the motherland.
					
					 She leads an optimistic life, having a balanced diet.
					
					 She told her children to work harder to firmly defend the grateful socialist system generation after generation.

articles.title: Congratulations from President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Congratulations from President of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Thein Sein, president of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar, on Feb. 5.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to extend our warm congratulations and best wishes to Your Excellency on behalf of the people of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar and on my own behalf on the occasion of the auspicious birth anniversary of the great leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I am convinced that the DPRK will achieve great development and your people will make steady progress and prosperity under the wise guidance of Your Excellency.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish Your Excellency good health and success in the work and the DPRK further development.

articles.title: Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Lauds Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Lauds Kim Jong Il's Exploits 
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency had an interview with Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 He said:
					
					 The people in south Korea are significantly celebrating the February holiday in boundless reverence for General Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The life of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC), was one of a great man characterized by his patriotic devotion to the country and nation. 
					
					 He led all the Koreans who loved the nation to the patriotic movement for national reunification, irrespective of his or her past, with compatriotism and generosity and, thus ushered in the June 15 era of reunification in the frozen land. 
					
					 Shining in the history of Korean nation is the undying exploits he performed by turning the era of division into that of reunification.
					
					 As the Day of the Shining Star approaches, loud voices praising his greatness are being heard from the south Korean public including workers, peasants, youth and students. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un who has carried forward the lineage of Mt. Paektu is standing in the van of the cause of national reunification.
					
					 History proves that Kim Jong Un is identical to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We are more firmly convinced that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration provided by Kim Jong Il will be implemented without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Korean nation has a bright future and the thriving socialist country and national reunification, lifelong desires of Kim Jong Il, will certainly come true under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill from the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Bao-zhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association and Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindalle Children's Foundation, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Feb. 14.

articles.title: Floral Baskets from Family of Zhang Wei-hua
articles.content:
Floral Baskets from Family of Zhang Wei-hua
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were from the family of Zhang Wei-hua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, the Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Hyogo Prefectural Citizens Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship, the Shigoku Liaison Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship, the Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association and Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Stamps Issued to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Stamps Issued to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK issued four kinds of stamps to mark the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 With letters "gift animals" on their upper part, the stamps feature Camelus dromedarius, Equus caballus , Papio hamadryas and Lynx lynx, presented as gifts to Kim Jong Il by foreigners.
					
					 At the Central Zoo in Pyongyang there are hundreds of species of animals party and state leaders and prominent personages of different countries and overseas compatriots presented to him.

articles.title: Collection of Writings Off Press in DPRK
articles.content:
Collection of Writings Off Press in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- A collection of writings "The Great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il Will Always Be with Us" was brought out in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 320 works created by 160 schoolchildren, including children's song "Multi-color Fireworks on Jong Il Peak", children's poem "We Will Become Army of Marshal" and lyric poem "Yearning for General". 
					
					 The works praised the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for devoting themselves to the future of the country while putting forward the children as the king of the country. 
					
					 They said that the schoolchildren in the DPRK are the happiest in the world as they are growing cheerfully under the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Reflected in the book is the firm pledge of schoolchildren who will grow stoutly to be reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Songun by learning harder, bearing in mind the great solicitude of the Marshal.
					
					 The book introduces the schoolchildren who created writings and deals with the motive of their creative work and comments on them.

articles.title: Germ Warfare Waged by US during Korean War (3)
articles.content:
Germ Warfare Waged by US during Korean War (3)
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. use of germ weapons in the 1950-1953 Korean War had lashed the whole world into great fury.
					 At that time, the protest against the U.S. germ warfare was growing stronger in the Soviet Union, Poland, Bulgaria, Romania, Vietnam, India, Italy, France, UK, Australia and many other countries and international bodies.
					
					 Protest rallies took place one after another and many governments, political parties and organizations and personages of different social standings sent written protests, statements, letters and telegrams to the United Nations and other international bodies to express their surging wrath.
					
					 World media carried articles and statements condemning the U.S. germ warfare and calling for punishing the U.S. imperialist cannibals.
					
					 In March 1952 the World Peace Council in its appeal said that the U.S. germ warfare was a heinous crime equivalent to the U.S. nuclear attack on Hiroshima, which killed hundreds of thousands of inhabitants in some seconds.
					
					 The world public branded the U.S. barbarians as the enemy of humankind, contending that they far surpassed the Hitler fascists in brutality and inhumanity.
					
					 In March 1952 the International Association of Democratic Lawyers' fact-finding team announced a communique on the criminal germ warfare of the U.S. imperialist aggression army and then a "report on the U.S. crimes in Korea" after its two-week investigation.
					
					 This report, which involved delegates from various countries and even the U.S. allies taking part in the Korean War, clearly went to prove that the U.S. used germ and chemical weapons in the war in breach of international conventions.
					
					 No statue of limitations is applicable to this crime committed by the U.S. in the war.
					
					 The U.S. is sure to be brought to the court of history, and anyone attempting to deny or cover up this stark fact will be regarded as the enemy common to humankind.

articles.title: US, S. Korea's North-targeted War Drills Blasted
articles.content:
US, S. Korea's North-targeted War Drills Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean air force independently staged a combat flight drill called "Flying Foal Eagle" on February 7. 
					 Search-battalions of the U.S. and south Korean puppet marine corps conducted a combined naval infiltration drill on the coastal area of Kanghwa Island on February 10. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers made an imaginary scenario at the Institute for National Defense Studies of south Korea and staged a drill for operating extended deterrence for getting familiar with corresponding procedures for politico-military counter-reaction under the pretext of "coping with threats of  nukes, WMDs and ballistic missile of north Korea" from February 11 to 13. 
					
					 Papers Saturday say in commentaries this is a very reckless act of driving the inter-Korean relations to the extreme phase of catastrophe. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The south Korean authorities remain unchanged in their nature of seeking confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and cooperation with outside forces for a nuclear war against the north, not reconciliation and unity between the north and the south. 
					
					 The prevailing grave situation goes to prove that the south Korean authorities have not an iota of responsibility for the destiny of the north-south relations but are only seeking to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north by force in collusion with the U.S. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should choose between two options: to come out for a final showdown with the north to meet a miserable end or halt all military provocations and settle the issue of the inter-Korean relations by the concerted efforts of Koreans. 
					
					 Minju Joson urges the U.S. and south Korean warmongers to bear in mind that they will face severe punishment by the servicepersons and people of the DPRK if they go so reckless as to drive the situation to an extreme phase, overheated with anti-north war hysteria.

articles.title: S. Korea's Suppression of Pro-reunification and Democratic Forces Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Suppression of Pro-reunification and Democratic Forces Assailed
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article denounces the south Korean authorities for getting frantic in their anti-reunification moves and brands this as an unpardonable act of treachery aimed to quell the nation's unity and all Koreans' desire for reunification and escalate north-south confrontation. 
					 It was quite natural for the patriotic and progressive organizations and figures of south Korea to have conducted positive activities for national reunification as they have been exposed to the danger of war posed by outsiders who had imposed the tragedy of national division for a long time, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The "Security Law" which the south Korean authorities have zealously invoked is an anti-reunification and confrontational law that violates human rights by branding the fellow countrymen in the north as "an anti-state organization" and pro-reunification and democratic forces as "enemy-benefiting organization following the north" and "forces keen on bringing down the social system."
					
					 The south Korean authorities are set to render the SL more fascist in a bid to clamp down on the pro-reunification and democratic forces by linking them with the north. This is a blatant challenge and provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are plunging into a catastrophe, far from heading for dialogue. This is attributable to the south Korean authorities' fascist racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" and their fascist suppression on charges of violation of the SL.
					
					 It is imperative to put an unconditional end to the reckless acts of the south Korean puppet forces to revive "yusin" dictatorship and intensify the suppression of the reunification movement in order to achieve the national reconciliation and unity and improve the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' loud talk about "dialogue" and "improvement of the relations" between the north and the south while getting zealous in suppressing organizations and personages of all social standings struggling for social democracy and reunification of the country is nothing but an empty talk.

articles.title: KCNA Slams S. Korean Authorities' Double-Dealing Attitude
articles.content:
KCNA Slams S. Korean Authorities' Double-Dealing Attitude
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- It is so queer to see the south Korean authorities getting vocal about the improvement of the north-south relations whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					 The south Korean chief executive has constantly blustered that it is the "preconditions of dialogue" to "have firm security and perfect capability for counteraction" while crying out for "change" of someone.
					
					 On Feb. 4 and 5 the south Korean authorities let loose a string of coarse invectives that the DPRK keeps slandering and threatening the south, not responding to their proposals for dialogue and exchanges.
					
					 At the 48th central integrated defense meeting they made such venomous outpourings that despite their lots of efforts for the improvement of the north-south ties, the north keeps developing nuclear weapons and long-range ballistic missiles pursuant to the line on simultaneously developing the two fronts. They called for getting "firm military posture for counteraction" and "deterring the north's provocation".
					
					 This is a revelation of the double-dealing attitude of the south Korean chief executive who has often trumpeted about "creating conditions for unification and resumption of dialogue".
					
					 Like master, like man. The puppet authorities chime in with her words by crying out for "achieving unification under liberal democracy at the risk of their lives in 2015" and "making appropriate counteraction in line with the U.S. 'additional sanctions against the north'".
					
					 The military warmongers challenged the DPRK's demand for halting the war exercises, by asserting that "the exercises have nothing to do with the atmosphere of dialogue" and "the joint military exercises will go on as long as the south has an alliance with the U.S."
					
					 The puppet Ministry of Unification openly encourages anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations of diehard conservative organizations, claiming that "leaflet scattering operations pertain to basic right and no coercion should be involved even though they may be a stumbling block in the way of improving the south-north relations." Shortly ago, the puppet Human Rights Committee openly adopted a resolution which said that anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operations "should not be checked as it can be restriction on the freedom of expression".
					
					 All facts prove that "dialogue" and "unification" touted by the south Korean authorities are nothing but a smokescreen to cover up their confrontational nature and that they whet the sword for achieving "unification of social systems" behind the scene.
					
					 The north-south relations can never improve as long as confrontation is pursued behind the call for dialogue.
					
					 The history of confrontation between the fellow countrymen still persists and Korea has not yet been reunified though 70 years have passed since the division of the nation. This is attributable to the south Korean authorities' despicable attitude of acting quite contrary to their words.
					
					 Now the puppet forces' moves for confrontation with the DPRK are becoming a fuse that can fuel mistrust and hostility between the fellow countrymen and cause an uncontrollable situation in the relations between the north and the south all of a sudden.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not misjudge the sincere desire of the DPRK to write a new history of the improvement of the north-south relations this year.
					
					 Only a total ruin will await traitors going against the desire and interests of the nation.

articles.title: Action for Probing Truth about Sewol Disaster Staged in Kwangju
articles.content:
Action for Probing Truth about Sewol Disaster Staged in Kwangju
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The Consultative Council of Families of Victims for Probing the Truth about April 16 Ferry Sewol Disaster and Building Stable Society in south Korea staged an action in Kwangju on Feb. 8, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 Its participants held a meeting in front of the May 18 national cemetery in memory of the martyrs who laid down their lives for democracy.   Then they marched along streets of Kwangju. 
					
					 They declared that they will hold a press conference in Kwangju on February 9, the 300th day since the disaster, and carry on their march for the probe into the truth about the tragedy.

articles.title: Lecture Given by Chongryon
articles.content:
Lecture Given by Chongryon
 Tokyo, February 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- A lecture of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 12 to celebrate the 73rd birth anniversary of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants watched the video "Great Career Shining on Road for National Reunification". 
					
					 Prior to it, they watched a Korean film documenting the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed for the global cause of independence through his outstanding diplomatic stratagem and energetic external activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Kuwaiti Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Kuwaiti Figure
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, released a statement on February 6.
					 He said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was born as son of guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of the revolution, on February 16, 1942 and adorned his life as an immortal heroic epic, holding high a red flag all his life.
					
					 He was the sun of Juche as he clearly indicated the road of the era and revolution with his outstanding revolutionary idea, a great father of the Korean nation and staunch revolutionary who dynamically pushed forward the struggle for achieving a final victory in the building of a thriving nation with his ardent patriotic devotion and the sun of eternal life as he trained a great unit of heroes.
					
					 He developed in depth President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs with deep insight into the requirements of the rapidly changing times. This is an exploit to be specially recorded in the history of human thought.
					
					 The exploits Kim Jong Il performed by wisely leading the complicated revolution of various stages and construction for a long period are unprecedented in their rich contents and might.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's history of the sun is now being given steady continuity by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He is always alive with the Korean people and progressive people of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A seminar took place in Romania, meeting, photo exhibition and film show in South Africa and meeting and book exhibition in Ecuador on Feb. 8 and 9.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing the Korean people building a thriving nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Okryu Children's Hospital".
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, praised Kim Jong Il as the tender-hearted leader of the people who devoted everything to the happiness of the people and the reunification of the country.
					
					 A secretary of a regional committee of the Gauteng Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party noted that Kim Jong Il defended the sovereignty of the country and the nation from the enemies' moves for aggression by dint of Songun and bolstered up the defence capability in every way. 
					
					 Julio Ballesteros Espin, chairman of the Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador, said that the Korean people would always win victory in the struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Romania and South Africa.

articles.title: DPRK Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK photo, book and handicraft exhibitions opened in Brazil, Mexico and Peru on Feb. 4 and 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with undying feats of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handiworks associated with the wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 Officials of a city office of Brazil praised Kim Jong Il for wisely leading the struggle to defend socialism and the drive to build a thriving nation and devoting himself to the people's happiness.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico lauded Kim Jong Il as the great leader and tender-hearted father who devoted himself to the people's happiness and the building of a thriving socialist nation till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The secretary general of the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship said that Kim Jong Il devoted himself to the country and its people and global independence, performing feats which will shine forever with the century.
					
					 The exhibition will offer the Peruvian people an opportunity to know better about the greatness and feats of Kim Jong Il, the long-standing history of Korea and the heroic fighting spirit, wisdom and skills of the Korean people, the secretary general added.

articles.title: Birthday of Korean Regular Armed Forces Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
Birthday of Korean Regular Armed Forces Observed in Guinea
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- A lecture, photo exhibition and film show took place at the Guinean Ministry of Defence on Feb. 6 on the occasion of the birthday of the Korean regular revolutionary armed forces (February 8).
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Also displayed there photos showing the proud history of the Korean People's Army (KPA) adorned with victories and glory.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks".
					
					 Alpha Cabinet Keita, commander of the First Commando Force of the Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army, gave a lecture titled "February 8, 1948 will go down in the history along with the invincible mettle of the KPA".
					
					 He said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung started the work for training military and political cadres and paid great attention to creating units of services and arms necessary for building the regular armed forces.
					
					 He paid deep attention to the work for providing the foundation for the self-reliant munitions industry.
					
					 As a result, a military parade took place with splendor on the occasion of February 8, 1948, the birthday of the KPA as the regular armed forces.
					
					 Later the KPA inflicted a bitter defeat upon the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world in the Korean War for the first time in their history, thus honorably defending the country's sovereignty and dignity.

articles.title: Invincible Might of KPA Introduced by German Organization
articles.content:
Invincible Might of KPA Introduced by German Organization
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article on Feb. 8, the 67th anniversary of the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The article said that the regular armed forces of socialist Korea proclaimed their foundation on Feb. 8, 1948.
					
					 After Korea's liberation, the President dynamically pushed forward the preparations for building the regular armed forces on the basis of his precious experience in building the army gained in the crucible of the anti-Japanese war and thus proclaimed the founding of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the regular revolutionary armed forces, on Feb. 8, 1948.
					
					 The KPA won the war against the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world early in the 1950s and thus brought about the beginning of the downhill turn for the U.S. imperialists and honorably defended the country's sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 Since then, the KPA has coped with every military threat and provocation of the U.S. in the fierce confrontation with it and fully displayed the might as an invincible army.
					
					 Feb. 8, 1948 will always remain recorded in the history along with the invincible mettle of the KPA which has reliably defended Korean socialism and ensured peace and security on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by UK Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by UK Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on Feb. 4 in support of the statement titled "U.S. imperialists, engrossed by hostile policy toward the DPRK, will take a bitter taste of final doom" made by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 The statement made by the NDC of the DPRK is the Korean people's just reaction to the reactionary policy of the Obama administration.
					
					 Recently the DPRK NDC officially informed the Obama administration that the DPRK has no longer need or willingness to sit at negotiating table with the U.S. since the latter seeks to "bring down" its social system. This is a clear manifestation of the DPRK's revolutionary and independent stand against imperialism.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite a war, the army and people of the DPRK will make a decisive strike at them, the unprecedented one they have neither heard nor seen.
					
					 The final doom of the U.S. imperialists will be precipitated.
					
					 We will always and positively support the Korean people in their struggle for defending the sovereignty of the DPRK, the motherland of Juche and people's paradise, and socialist system.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Personage Denounces US for Their Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Personage Denounces US for Their Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
 Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, strongly denounced the U.S. and its followers for their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					 The statement on Feb. 2 said:
					
					 It was disclosed to the world that the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" rammed at the third committee of the 69th UN General Assembly was based on the false testimonies of "defectors from the north".
					
					 Given the evident fact that the "report of the Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights performance in the DPRK was one of fabrication and fraud, the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" has to be nullified as it was cooked up on its basis. 
					
					 On Feb. 4, he in the protest letters sent to the UN secretary general and the UN high commissioner for Human Rights said that it is a deplorable thing that the UN which was founded with the mission of ensuring global peace and security is being misused as a lawless tool mocking at the justice and truth by such a specified state as the U.S. He strongly called for the nullification of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalos a Estudios de Dibujos Animados 26 de Abril de Corea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalos a Estudios de Dibujos Animados 26 de Abril de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio los regalos a los Estudios de Dibujos Animados 26 de Abril de Corea.
					Al visitarlos en noviembre del ano pasado, el Mariscal aclaro el rumbo y los remedios para crear las obras maestras que les gustan a los habitantes, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Y esta vez, envio las instalaciones modernas necesarias a la perfeccion de la modernizacion, la cienfitizacion, la computarizacion y la digitalizacion los Estudios.
					
					Tuvo lugar hoy en la misma unidad la ceremonia de entrega de regalos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Ki Nam, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios de la rama interesada, asi como los funcionarios, creadores, artistas y empleados de los Estudios.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos condenan ejercicios de guerra de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos condenan ejercicios de guerra de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- Las fuerzas aereas de los titeres surcoreanos realizaron el dia 7 el entrenamiento independiente de vuelo "Aguila volando".
					Y los batallones de busqueda de las infanterias de marina de EE.UU. y del Sur de Corea perpetraron el dia 10 en la costa de la isla Kanghwa el simulacro combinado de penetracion maritima.
					
					Desde el dia 11 hasta el 13, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos presentaron, en el instituto de defensa nacional, el virtual plan  frente a la "amenaza de armas nucleares y de exterminio masivo y los misiles balisticas del Norte" y libraron el entrenamiento de aplicacion de los medios de detencion ampliada para completar el proceso de enfrentamiento politico y militar.
					
					Los periodicos condenan en los comentarios individuales del dia 14, que todo esto es la locura muy imprudente que lleva al limite catastrofico las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Rodong Sinmun revela que no se ha cambiado la naturaleza de la banda titere del Sur de Corea que persigue la confrontacion fratricida y la cooperacion de guerra nuclear con las fuerzas exteriores contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					La situacion grave creada en la actualidad comprueba que la banda titere no tiene nada de la responsabilidad sobre el destino de las relaciones intercoreanas y solamente pretende aniquilar a fuerza a sus compatriotas en contubernio con EE.UU., senala.
					
					E insiste en que las autoridades surcoreanas deben optar uno de dos alternativos: sufrir  el fin triste en la batalla definitiva contra los compatriotas o parar totalmente la provocacion militar y resolver entre los connacionales los problemas de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Minju Joson tambien advierte a los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos que no evitaran el castigo severo del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC si agravan la situacion inflamados por la guerra anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia represion contra fuerzas democraticas en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia represion contra fuerzas democraticas en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica la represion de las autoridades surcoreanas a las fuerzas pro-reunificacion como imperdonable acto traidor que sofoca la aspiracion nacional a la unidad y reunificacion de la patria y agrava la confrontacion Norte-Sur. 
					Las entidades y las personalidades patrioticas y progresistas del Sur de Corea se esfuerzan mucho por reunificar la patria. Es que durante largo tiempo, ellas vinieron sufriendo la tragedia de division nacional y el peligro de guerra causado por las fuerzas extranjeras, senala el articulo y continua:
					
					La "ley de seguridad" del Sur de Corea es la anti-reunificacion y anti-DDHH que califica a la parte connacional como "entidad antiestatal" y reprime a las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion considerandolas como "proenemigas que obedecen al Norte de Corea y persiguen el derrocamiento de regimen".
					
					Esto es un desafio frontal y provocacion a la RPDC.
					
					Ahora las relaciones intercoreanas no se dirigen al dialogo sino a la ruptura, debido a la fanatica represion de las autoridades surcoreanas que recurren a la campana fascista contra las "fuerzas pro-Norte" en virtud de la "ley de seguridad". 
					
					Para la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la mejora de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, hay que parar los actos de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas que estan desesperadas para rehabilitar la dictadura de "Yusin" y acabar con el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					No pasan de ser palabras vacias el "dialogo" y la "mejora de relaciones" de que hablan las autoridades surcoreanas recurriendo por otra parte a la represion contra las entidades y personalidades que luchan por la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana y la reintegracion territorial de la patria.

articles.title: ACNC comenta actitud dual de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
ACNC comenta actitud dual de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 14 de febrero (ACNC) -- Las autoridades surcoreanas no pierden ninguna oportunidad para hablar del mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, pero en realidad se mueven en el sentido contrario.
					Insistiendo en el "cambio" de alguien, la mandataria surcoreana dice que "disponer de perfecta capacidad de seguridad y reaccion" es la "premisa de dialogo" 
					
					Los dias 4 y 5, disparateo que la parte Norte sigue criticando y amenazando al Sur de Corea sin aceptar su propuesta de dialogo e intercambio. 
					
					En la 48a reunion conjunta central de defensa, maldijo que ellos se esfuerzan mucho por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, pero la RPDC no renuncia la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares y continua desarrollando armas nucleares y misiles balisticos de larga distancia. E insistio en mantenerse en "la perfecta disposicion militar" para "disuadir la provocacion del Norte de Corea".
					
					Entre tanto, las autoridades titeres surcoreanas pronuncian otros chismes, tales como "logremos a muerte en 2015 la unificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal" y aplauden las injustas "sanciones adicionales" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. como "contramedidas adecuadas". 
					
					Los belicistas del circulo militar desafian a la demanda de la RPDC de parar los ejercicios belicos diciendo que "entrenamientos militares no tienen nada que ver con el ambiente de dialogo" y que "continuaran los ejercicios militares conjuntos mientras exista el sistema de alianza con EE.UU.".
					
					En cuanto al lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC por parte de las entidades conservadoras, el Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea lo instiga abiertamente arguyendo que "eso es un derecho principal y no se puede detenerlo de modo forzado aunque obstaculice la mejora de relaciones Sur-Norte". 
					
					Hace poco, el Comite de Derechos Humanos del Sur de Corea aprobo hasta una resolucion de que "no deben frenar el lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC porque eso seria la restriccion de la libertad de expresion". 
					
					Tales hechos evidencian que el "dialogo" y "reunificacion" de que hablan las autoridades surcoreanas no pasan de ser una cortina de humo para ocultar su naturaleza conflictiva y que ellas persiguen la ambicion de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					Mientras hablan del dialogo recurriendo a la confrontacion fratricida, no se mejoraran jamas las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Hasta la fecha que data de 70 anos de la division nacional perdura el enfrentamiento fratricida y no se logra la reintegracion territorial del pais, debido a la actitud dual y traidora de las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					Ahora las maniobras conflictivas anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos causan la desconfianza y la hostilidad entre los connacionales y llevan las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase irreparable. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben malentender nuestra sinceridad de escribir este ano una nueva historia en la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Los traidores que nadan a contrapelo de la voluntad e intereses de la nacion no podran eludir el arruinamiento total.
